meanings.definition: Waste (money, time, or resources) in a reckless or foolish manner.
meanings.sent1: He squanders his allowance on unnecessary toys.
meanings.sent2: She always squanders her time watching mindless TV shows.
meanings.sent3: The careless spender squanders all his money on useless gadgets.
meanings.sent4: She squanders her talents by not pursuing her passion for art.
meanings.sent5: The company squanders resources on extravagant office decorations.

meanings.definition: Allow (an opportunity) to pass or be lost.
meanings.sent1: Don't squander the chance to learn something new.
meanings.sent2: She squanders every opportunity to improve her skills.
meanings.sent3: He squanders the opportunity to make a good impression by arriving late.
meanings.sent4: She squanders the chance to travel by always making excuses.
meanings.sent5: The team squanders the opportunity to win by not practicing enough.
